attributes.action: Invalidate all laws, including those of echr that compromise Uk border security
attributes.additional_details: Because the government are not putting british people first
attributes.background: To start putting the people they serve first instead of us feeling neglected in our own country

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure which laws you'd like to be repealed. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
